lyric:
[00:26.20]Well you only need the light when it's burning low
[00:29.50]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[00:32.30]Only know you love her when you let her go
[00:38.30]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[00:42.30]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[00:46.00]Only know you love her when you let her go
[00:52.00]And you let her go
[01:06.00]Staring at the bottom of your glass
[01:07.50]Hoping one day you'll make a dream last
[01:11.20]But dreams come slow and they go so fast
[01:18.30]You see her when you close your eyes
[01:20.40]Maybe one day you'll understand why
[01:23.40]Everything you touch surely dies
[01:30.30]But you only need the light when it's burning low
[01:33.50]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[01:36.50]Only know you love her when you let her go
[01:43.00]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[01:47.00]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[01:50.00]Only know you love her when you let her go
[01:57.00]Staring at the ceiling in the dark
[02:00.00]Same old empty feeling in your heart
[02:02.20]Cos love comes slow and it goes so fast
[02:09.40]Well you see her when you fall asleep
[02:11.40]But never to touch and never to keep
[02:15.00]Cos you loved her too much and you dive too deep
[02:20.30]Well you only need the light when it's burning low
[02:25.00]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[02:28.00]Only know you love her when you let her go
[02:34.00]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[02:37.30]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[02:41.00]Only know you love her when you let her go
[02:46.00]And you let her go
[02:53.20]And you let her go
[02:59.40]Well you let her go
[03:12.40]Cos you only need the light when it's burning low
[03:16.00]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[03:19.40]Only know you love her when you let her go
[03:25.20]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[03:29.00]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[03:32.00]Only know you love her when you let her go
[03:38.30]Cos you only need the light when it's burning low
[03:42.00]Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
[03:45.00]Only know you love her when you let her go
[03:51.50]Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
[03:56.00]Only hate the road when you're missing home
[03:59.40]Only know you love her when you let her go
[04:06.40]And you let her go
[04:11.00]
tlyric:
[00:26.20]只有在朦胧黯淡时才念及灯火光亮
[00:29.50]只有在冰天雪地时才怀念阳光温暖
[00:32.30]只有在已然放手后才始知那是真爱
[00:38.30]只有在身处低谷时才遥想过去峥嵘
[00:42.30]只有在乡愁涌动时才痛恨旅途遥远
[00:46.00]只有在让她走之后才始知那是真爱
[00:52.00]你就让她走吧
[01:06.00]酒杯已空，醉然疑视。
[01:07.50]希望有一天，你能让梦持续。
[01:11.20]但是梦想来的太慢，走得太快。
[01:18.30]闭上双眼，整个脑海都是你。
[01:20.40]也许有一天，你会明白，
[01:23.40]自己是如何亲手毁掉了一段爱情
[01:30.30]但是你只需要朦胧暗淡时的光亮。
[01:33.50]只有在冰天雪地时才怀念阳光温暖
[01:36.50]只有在让她走之后才始知那是真爱

[01:47.00]只有在乡愁涌动时才痛恨旅途遥远
[01:50.00]只有在让她走之后才始知那是真爱
[01:57.00]繁星满天 你痴痴的望着天花板
[02:00.00]又是一个无比寂寞空虚的无眠夜'
[02:02.20]爱情来的太慢，走得太快
[02:09.40]如今你只得在梦里与她相见
[02:11.40]可这梦脆弱的经不起触碰 经不起长久'
[02:15.00]你爱她越深 你亦而陷的越深
[02:20.30]只有在朦胧黯淡时才念及灯火光亮
